resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73162</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73162</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40dafff6-8c00-45cd-2888-194c6186b8b7#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890: A look at this great artist, his picture techniques, painting terms, biographical information and his letters by Artist Douglas Carpenter (angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="en">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890: A look at this great artist, his picture techniques, painting terms, biographical information and his letters by Artist Douglas Carpenter (angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890: Ein Blick auf 
diesen großen Künstler, seine Abbildung Techniken, malende 
Bezeichnungen, biographische Informationen und seine Briefe durch 
Artist Douglas Tischler (angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890 : Un regard à 
ce grand artiste, à ses techniques d'image, à limites peignantes, à
information biographique et à ses lettres par le charpentier d'Artist
Douglas (l'angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vincent camionete Gogh 1853 - 1890: Um olhar
neste artista grande, em suas técnicas do retrato, em termos 
pintando, na informação biographical e nas suas letras pelo 
carpinteiro de Artista Douglas (o angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890: Uno sguardo a 
questo artista grande, alle sue tecniche dell'immagine, ai termini di 
verniciatura, alle informazioni biographical ed alle sue lettere dal 
carpentiere dell'Artist Douglas (angol nyelven)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Vincent βαν Gogh 1853 - 1890: Ένα 
βλέμμα σε αυτόν τον μεγάλο καλλιτέχνη, τις τεχνικές εικόνων, 
τους όρους ζωγραφικής, τις βιογραφικές πληροφορίες του και τις 
επιστολές του από τον ξυλουργό Ντάγκλας καλλιτεχνών (το angol)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vincent van Gogh 1853 - 1890: Una mirada en 
este gran artista, sus técnicas del cuadro, los términos que pintan,
la información biográfica y sus cartas del carpintero de Artist 
Douglas (el angol nyelven)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Elsősorban a Kárpát-medencét bemutató térképen ábrázolni nyilakkal, vonalakkal a magyarok útját, valamint egyéb népekét. Az animációt hangalámondás kíséri.</string>
            <string language="en">Above all demonstrate with arrows the route of the Hungarians and other peoples on a map that represents the Carparhian Basin. The animation is accompanied by dubbing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">besenyők,  Baskíria,  Kazárország,  Kárpát- medence,  </string>
            <string language="en">Petchenegs, Baskiri,  Kazar, Carpathian Basin  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstrieren Sie vor allem mit Pfeilen den Weg 
der Ungarn und anderer Völker auf einer Karte, die das Carparhian 
Bassin darstellt. Die Animation wird von der Nachsynchronisation
begleitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démontrez surtout avec des flèches l'itinéraire
des Hongrois et d'autres peuples sur une carte qui représente le 
bassin de Carparhian. L'animation est accompagnée du doublage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstre sobretudo com setas a rota dos 
hungarians e de outros povos em um mapa que represente a bacia de 
Carparhian. O animation é acompanhado pelo dubbing.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soprattutto dimostri con le frecce l'itinerario 
degli ungheresi e dell'altra gente su un programma che rappresenta il 
bacino di Carparhian. La animazione è accompagnata dalla 
doppiatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προ πάντων καταδείξτε με τα βέλη τη διαδρομή των 
Ούγγρων και άλλων λαών σε έναν χάρτη που αντιπροσωπεύει τη 
λεκάνη Carparhian. Η ζωτικότητα συνοδεύεται με τη 
μεταγλώττιση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobretodo demuestre con las flechas la ruta de los
húngaros y de la otra gente en una correspondencia que represente el 
lavabo de Carparhian. La animación es acompañada por el 
doblaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Karpatenbassin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Bassin Carpathien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Bacia Carpathian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Bacino Carpatico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Καρπάθια λεκάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Petchenegs, Baskiri, Kazar, Lavabo Cárpato</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
